description: A full-featured utility for managing Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL).
notes: The right-click menu feature requires the shell extension DLL to be properly registered. You can run `regsvr32 LxRunOfflineShellExt.dll` as admin to register the DLL.

script: Invoke-ExternalCommand "regsvr32" -Args @('/u', '/s', "$dir\LxRunOfflineShellExt.dll") -RunAs -Activity 'Unregistering "LxRunOfflineShellExt.dll", a UAC popup may appear...' -ContinueExitCodes @{ 5 = 'If you have not manually registered it before, just ignore this message.' } | Out-Null
